DOC.brief_title: Meta-analyses Effect 'Catalytic ' Doses Fructose Its Epimers Carbohydrate Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Despite advance prevention treatment type 2 diabetes , prevalence continue rise worldwide . There need new modality improve glycemic control individual type 2 diabetes overweight obese risk type 2 diabetes . Contrary concern raise adverse role fructose metabolic health , may role fructose epimers , rare non caloric sugar allulose ( C-3 epimer fructose ) , tagatose ( C-4 epimer fructose ) , D-sorbose ( C-3 C-4 diastereomer fructose ) . All naturally find small quantity dry fruit maple syrup . Bother allulose tagatose generally recognize safe ( GRAS ) Food Drug Administration US market low-calorie sugar substitute anti-hyperglycemic effect . Various line evidence suggest fructose epimers may improve metabolic handle glucose induce glycogen synthesis . Recent small trial human suggest 'catalytic ' dos ( = < 10g/meal ) fructose epimers ( allulose , tagatose , sorbose ) may reduce postprandial glycemic response carbohydrate load ( i.e. , oral glucose tolerance test starch load ) people without type 2 diabetes . These acute effect show sustainable long term several control trial fructose tagatose . Need review : There urgent need synthesize evidence effect fructose epimers acute postprandial carbohydrate metabolism longterm glycemic control . There remain uncertainty regard minimum effective dose ( range study , 2-25g ) extent benefit translate meaningful longterm improvement glycemic control . A systematic review meta-analysis remain `` Gold Standard '' evidence support health claim development . It map available evidence , pool totality evidence , provide precise estimate true effect fructose epimers carbohydrate metabolism longterm glycemic control . Objectives : The investigator conduct two systematic review meta-analyses effect small 'catalytic ' dos fructose epimers . The objective first systematic review meta-analysis assess effect postprandial glycemic insulinemic response carbohydrates acute feeding trial , objective second systematic review meta-analysis assess effect marker glycemic control chronic feeding trial . Design : The plan conduct two propose systematic review meta-analyses follow Cochrane handbook systematic review intervention . The reporting follow Preferred Reporting Items Systematic review Meta-Analyses ( PRISMA ) guideline . Data source : MEDLINE , EMBASE The Cochrane Central Register Controlled Trials search use appropriate search term . Study selection : The first systematic review meta-analysis include single-bolus feeding trial assess effect small 'catalytic dos ( = < 10g/meal ) fructose epimers acute postprandial glycemic insulinemic response carbohydrate . The second systematic review meta-analysis include randomize controlled trial > =2-weeks diet duration investigate effect small 'catalytic dos ( = < 40g/day ) fructose epimers marker glycemic control . Data extraction : Two investigator independently extract relevant data ass risk bias use Cochrane Risk Bias Tool . All disagreement resolve consensus . Mean value SEs extract outcomes . Standard computation imputation use derive miss data . Outcomes : Acute glycemic outcome ( incremental area curve ( iAUC ) blood glucose insulin , Matsuda insulin sensitivity index , early insulin secretion index ) assess first systematic review meta-analysis chronic glycemic outcome ( HbA1c , fast glucose , fast insulin ) assess second systematic review meta-analysis . Data synthesis : Ratios mean pooled acute glycemic outcome mean difference pool chronic glycemic outcome use Generic Inverse Variance method random effect model . Random-effects model use even absence statistically significant between-study heterogeneity , yield conservative summary effect estimate presence residual heterogeneity . Fixed-effects model use < 5 included study . Paired analyse apply crossover trial . Heterogeneity test ( Cochran Q statistic ) quantify ( I2 statistic ) . To explore source heterogeneity , investigator conduct sensitivity analysis , study systematically remove . If > =10 study , investigator also explore source heterogeneity priori subgroup analysis participant phenotype , dose , comparator , baseline measurement , risk bias , study design ( parallel , crossover ) , energy balance ( positive , neutral , negative ) , duration follow-up . Metaregression assess significance categorical subgroup analyse model continuous dose response relationship . Where evidence linear relationship observe , meta-regression spline curve model undertaken ( MKSPLINE procedure ) ass dose threshold characterize segment dose-response curve separate linear approximation may best describe data . If 10 trial comparison , Publication publication bias assess inspection funnel plot Egger Begg test . If publication bias suspect , adjustment funnel plot asymmetry attempt impute miss study data use Duval Tweedie trim-and-fill method . Evidence Assessment : The strength evidence outcome assess use Grading Recommendations Assessment , Development Evaluation ( GRADE ) . Knowledge translation plan : Results disseminate traditional mean interactive presentation local , national , international scientific meeting publication high impact factor journal . Innovative mean webcasts e-mail feedback mechanism also use . Knowledge Users act knowledge broker network among opinion leader different adopter group increase awareness stage . Four Knowledge Users also participate directly member nutrition guideline committee . Target adopter include industry research community . Feedback incorporate use guide analyse improve key message stage . Significance : The propose project aid knowledge translation relate effect fructose epimers postprandial carbohydrate metabolism . This project aim inform future design single-meal feeding trial fructose epimers establish dose range effect postprandial carbohydrate metabolism .
DOC.criteria: Controlled trial human Acute singlebolus feeding fructose , allulose , tagatose , sorbose ( > =2hour profile ) chronic feed fructose , allulose , tagatose , sorbose ( > = 2weeks diet duration ) Doses fructose , allulose , tagatose , sorbose = < 10g/meal acute feeding trial = < 40g/day chronic feeding trial Adequate comparator ( reference carbohydrate control diet ) Outcome data report Nonhuman study observational study Lack adequate comparator control group Doses fructose , allulose , tagatose , sorbose provide > 10g/meal acute feeding trial > 40g/day chronic feeding trial Followup < 2hours acute feeding trial < 2weeks ( diet duration ) chronic feed trial Lack report outcome data
